topic.title: TypingMaster - Type as fast as you can :D
Are you bored with the day. play some typingmaster. How fast can you type :D. comment your score

1_1MRxCt3a3iqU3jM6SGrp9kiPYXrUMv8PYc.body: Well that's the best zeronet site so far :P

2_1MCsyW6W243LY69ZYm99XbV3M8Gbbrp5hF.body:
> [pycole](#comment_12_1KwTTgPRSTHFmmJAFBt6kQfdyNeSM5KJuH): Wait...<iframe width="100%" height="100%" src="https://torrentfreak.com/" />b
>  You can do that? Neat. And here I was thinking that Rss was the simplest way.

or use this it will look neater: <iframe src="" style="position:fixed; top:0px; left:0px; bottom:0px; right:0px; width:100%; height:100%; border:none; margin:0; padding:0; overflow:hidden; z-index:999999;"></iframe>

1_1KwTTgPRSTHFmmJAFBt6kQfdyNeSM5KJuH.body:
> [zaphod](#comment_12_1JA2umSc9f7VSNLaYLs1Cpk7rpvS4p18xe): EDIT: False alarm, just started to work for me after having the site open for countless minutes on several occasions over the last hours. Looks neat and still I am missing the point here - seems to be doing most work at tieps14.herokuapp.com, which would come down to a single point of failure.Does anyone care to explain this site to me?
> Added it to the roadmap anyways.Available athttp://127.0.0.1:43110/zaphods.bit/RM.html

Yeah it was a test site i made in school. I might eventually fully import it to zeronet so its not an iframe anymore but for now its what it is :D

> [zaphod](#comment_16_1JA2umSc9f7VSNLaYLs1Cpk7rpvS4p18xe): Ahh I see, it looks very nice none the less - all javascript or is there some php buried somewhere? :)

pretty much javascript. the whole thing is runned by nodejs and thats the main reason its a bit hard to make it work in zeronet :D

> [thatlurker](#comment_4_1BhtLu1iKdZ2HaBNUrDdmwqF11ZC4y3zL): pretty much javascript. the whole thing is runned by nodejs and thats the main reason its a bit hard to make it work in zeronet :D

and that's why i will completely rewrite it to work on zeronet, but because im a bit lazy it might take some time :P

> [drez](#comment_1_1NkWaxzbBghxi1FkoY5ybUrFsNfr3Gjzp6): Hope this will get some more love to it, really liking how it's looking but I wasn't able to do anything with it in it's current state. Zeronet really need more chat services that are more complete, along with forums... Mgh~ x3

just type /help and it gives you the list of commands.
main commands needed are: /nick <TheNameYouWant>
/join <TheNameForTheRoomYouWantToCreate> (Otheres need to type this to join it :D)
/key <SomeWordOrNumber>(Used to encrypt the chat messages, others need the same key with that command so they can see your messages :D).

and yeas i made it :D

3_1BhtLu1iKdZ2HaBNUrDdmwqF11ZC4y3zL.body: For those who are interested im working on a scoreboard and an ability for you to add a wordlist so the language support crows :D
